age_cues.face_youthfulness: Soft oval face with youthful fullness; gently tapered chin; avoid hollow cheeks
age_cues.eye_area: Bright, alert eyes; smooth under-eye area with minimal shadowing (no tired look)
age_cues.age_markers: No pronounced fine lines; no prominent nasolabial folds
age_cues.anti_gaunt_guard: Even with very lean body, maintain fresh healthy facial fullness (avoid gaunt or hollowed look)
